description: This is an HTML source file that defines the front-end user interface for a database viewer application. It includes HTML structure, CSS styling, and embedded JavaScript for dynamic interactions such as loading databases, tables, and table data, as well as UI updates and error handling.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and updates the sidebar list.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by reloading the databases from the API.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database to show its tables, and loads tables when expanded.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and renders it in a table format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs and inserts the HTML table based on data received.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual table cell contents, including handling wide content and objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses table cell content for viewing full data.
